query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'messages' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'ologywood';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user KrGaEuKwKPW5NAp.root --database mP6FLm6cHUyVdEMNViNuZS --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'messages' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'ologywood';
